Title: Angola, Bontang offer March-April LNG cargoes
Description: Angola LNG and Indonesia’s state-owned Pertamina are each offering cargoes for delivery across March and April through tenders closing on Feb. 23.
Author: CK

Title: Kogas issues third tender seeking March LNG cargoes
Description: Korea’s state-owned Kogas has issued a tender to buy an unspecified number of cargoes for delivery across Mar. 1-31, making this the third tender in around two weeks that the firm has issued to buy March cargoes. The new tender closes tomorrow.
Author: CK

Title: Two LNG trains not under unplanned maintenance: Qatargas
Description: Qatargas says that two of its 14 LNG trains at the 77 mtpa Ras Laffan export facility are not offline due to unplanned maintenance, clarifying media reports that had suggested this.
Author: CK

Title: One LNG ship heads to Kaliningrad while another circles outside the terminal
Description: The 170,200 m3 Velikiy Novgorod LNG tanker is expected to head towards Kaliningrad to deliver what could be the Russian exclave’s third LNG cargo this year, even as another LNG tanker has circled for over two weeks in the Baltic Sea waiting to berth at the 1.89 mtpa Kaliningrad terminal.
Author: CK
